subtitles:
45813 49233 ( Girl ) People once believed
that when someone dies...

49316 53612 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

57115 62371 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

65581 70587 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

124846 129350 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

129433 132686 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

136273 140235 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

142653 145865 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?

147367 150202 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

150286 155166 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

158126 161463 ( Man ) You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

161547 166342 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

166426 168720 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

168762 171640 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

171723 174308 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

174391 177854 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

177937 180939 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.

189155 193368 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

193451 195662 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

195746 199665 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

212594 216640 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

216681 219976 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
226399 228651 You lied to her about Eric.

230402 234115 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

245583 251297 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.

273735 277780 ( Sarah ) A building gets torch ed.
All that is left is ashes.

277864 280742 I used to think that was true
about everything...

285287 289250 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

289291 293670 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

331914 335126 What are you,
like the night watchman?

356437 359815 You know, what this place
needs is a...

362317 366739 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

366780 369783 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
369866 372160 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
372244 375288 Hey, hey, let me do it.

375371 379417 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

379459 381920 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

381961 383921 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.

393722 397559 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

397643 401562 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

403523 407192 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?

407276 410488 - They make you fart big time.
- ( Chuckling )

416827 419538 ( Man ) You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

419621 422248 from all the crap
floating around in it.

423416 427170 I wish I could have seen that.
( Whistling )

531100 535021 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

558001 561379 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

568636 571221 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

579270 581940 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.

582023 585318 - Mickey, call it in for me!
- ( Woman Shouting )

701594 706181 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.

716190 719276 - ( Shelly ) No! Eric!
- ( Man ) See ya!

769866 772784 - Hey, that's good.
- ( Man ) That's good.

776663 780250 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

783586 788049 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

791719 793721 You go over there
and talk to your pals--

796932 800644 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?

825459 829755 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

829838 833717 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

833801 836886 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
836970 839764 Fire it up! Fire it up!

843017 844977 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doing?

880386 883889 - I love you.
- Say that again.

897651 900821 - ( Sarah ) Wow, you look great.
- ( Shelly ) Ta-da!

907869 910455 - Come here! ( Laughing )
- No, no, no!
957249 960794 * It doesn't matter how you hide *
960877 964214 * We find you if we're wanting to *

966592 970428 * So slide back down
and close your eyes *

970470 974682 * Sleep a while
you must be tired *

1011216 1015220 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
1017722 1022226 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

1026939 1029566 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.

1029650 1032486 Now, you,
take it or leave it.

1041328 1044498 - You cheap ass, chrome dome...
- ( Siren Wailing )

1047625 1050003 Close the gate
when you go out!

1050086 1052755 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1055424 1058844 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1063557 1068020 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.
1088914 1093710 * That point me to another day *

1173076 1176204 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?

1228544 1231172 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1231256 1235342 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1235426 1238846 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1238888 1241473 - You're out of your fucking mind--
- Listen!

1241556 1246395 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1246478 1251441 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.

1257113 1262910 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1272126 1277048 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1277132 1281761 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1286473 1289017 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1325344 1331224 * Sometimes it rains inside my head *

1339106 1343443 - Look at this mess!
What's the world coming to?
- It's a mess.
1348616 1350742 * No, they don't have to take you *

1350825 1353578 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1353662 1358249 * No, they don't have
to take you away *

1358332 1361627 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1362754 1364671 Give me some of that
over there!

1366924 1370636 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1370678 1375473 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1375515 1379353 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1379436 1383648 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1383689 1387776 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1430734 1435404 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.

1473190 1479321 * No, they don't have
to take you away **

1485952 1489121 ( Man ) Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!

1507722 1513269 - ( Clearing Throat )
- I told you to stay out of here.

1513310 1516981 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1517064 1521109 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

1526991 1529993 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1535706 1539377 - "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
- ( Laughing )
1554391 1556852 Who the fuck is this now?

1563900 1567736 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1575327 1579581 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1587255 1591634 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1591675 1595638 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."

1602770 1606898 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fucking new door!

1609317 1612279 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1644058 1649355 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1650981 1654442 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1657154 1660823 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

1668205 1671167 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1671250 1674295 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1674378 1677172 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1677255 1681427 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1681510 1686222 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1686306 1688224 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1688308 1692061 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.

1693270 1695690 What the hell
do you call that?

1699401 1703197 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1703238 1706033 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1715750 1718377 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1718419 1721339 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1721422 1725801 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1725884 1731389 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1734976 1737563 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1754453 1758665 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1782563 1785482 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1788735 1791571 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1791655 1794282 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1794365 1796743 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1796826 1801914 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1808920 1811673 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1811756 1814426 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1816093 1819472 Each one of these is a life...

1828606 1832776 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1841409 1845622 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1847498 1851586 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1851669 1855297 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!

1879736 1883198 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.

1890413 1894876 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1909764 1913685 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1913769 1918940 And I say I'm dead and I move.

1922360 1926739 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1926822 1929951 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1931828 1934997 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1935080 1939084 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

1941878 1946508 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1946550 1951387 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1951470 1955934 - It's getting too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1956017 1958435 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1958519 1963107 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1963190 1965775 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1965859 1969362 - ( Looter ) Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1969446 1974784 - ( Glass Shattering )
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1974867 1978538 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

1984293 1987712 - ( Woman Laughing )
- ( Looter ) Leave it, run!

1997513 2000099 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

2000183 2002477 and you lose him
right out in the open.

2002560 2008399 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.

2016782 2019993 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

2020076 2024331 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

2060531 2064493 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

2064577 2067787 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

2067871 2069623 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

2072459 2075795 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

2075837 2078131 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

2078214 2082801 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

2082843 2085429 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

2085513 2088682 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2091351 2093937 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2094021 2096814 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.

2099734 2103780 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2103864 2108326 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2108409 2110244 Call it my need to know.

2151616 2154911 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

2158789 2163085 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2163169 2166214 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2170342 2175096 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2176264 2179768 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2196700 2201287 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2201371 2205708 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2209295 2213507 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--"

2215718 2218596 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2218679 2222766 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2222849 2228730 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2228813 2232358 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2232442 2236446 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2243452 2247205 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2249458 2254212 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

2290496 2294166 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2319064 2321692 - There's a big fucking bird over there.
- * No more **

2359978 2364523 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!

2371405 2374450 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2382374 2387211 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2389213 2394134 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2418741 2421452 Stop me if you heard this one.

2429877 2432629 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2436341 2438593 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2444098 2448685 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

2450896 2454983 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2479214 2481216 I've got a gun
in my pocket.

2484261 2486971 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2520336 2524840 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2524923 2529678 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2540105 2544901 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2574678 2578349 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2581768 2585147 Fill it up yourself, macho man.

2600494 2603080 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2603163 2605624 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2605707 2608627 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2608711 2611504 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

2620429 2624142 - You stay put right there.
- ( Groaning )

2666806 2672562 ( Man On Radio ) As you can see, I'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2672604 2675356 - ( Door Squeaking )
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2675439 2678401 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2678484 2681445 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2681486 2683655 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2683739 2685866 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2685949 2690703 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--
2693790 2697293 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2703549 2707261 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2707344 2709597 You still have your hat on.
2725445 2729740 are you some kind of... ghost?

2739374 2743920 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2745922 2750010 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2750093 2753179 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2753262 2757850 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

2760644 2764982 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2765065 2768276 Her body finally just gave it up.

2768318 2772197 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2800097 2802183 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2802266 2807730 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2807813 2812568 I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2812610 2815570 Give me something
I could work with.

2820409 2822910 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2822994 2826331 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2826414 2829875 would talk after
what happened to you?

2833254 2835923 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

2841970 2846432 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2851313 2855316 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2855399 2858903 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2871623 2876085 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2880757 2883967 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2887596 2890307 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2893351 2899190 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2910284 2913788 ( Gideon ) I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2913871 2916998 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2917082 2920127 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2920210 2923463 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2923504 2926049 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2926132 2930553 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2935725 2938185 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2938268 2940771 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2940854 2946359 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.

2949279 2954367 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!

2961665 2964084 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2964168 2966170 What're you telling me,
this thing is real?

2966211 2969881 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2969964 2973927 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2974010 2978139 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2980933 2986105 Eyes see. It's one of the most important
things I learned from my sister.

2986188 2989442 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? ( Laughing )

2992944 2996114 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

2996198 2998450 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

2998534 3002036 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

3002161 3005623 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3005707 3009084 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

3011462 3015258 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

3018468 3023140 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

3023222 3027602 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
3027644 3030355 I ain't making all this up.

3030438 3034942 I ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

3043534 3048538 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

3058798 3061801 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

3071101 3073395 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

3076148 3081027 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

3081110 3085031 I'll have the janitor
come on up.
3156722 3158641 * It can't rain all the time *

3158725 3163229 ( Skipping )
* Can't rain all the time *

3172320 3175032 ( T-bird ) I don't know how many times I
gotta tell you. We're in this together!
3175115 3178035 One part falls, it all falls!

3178118 3181579 - You know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

3181621 3184207 That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fucking voodoo doll!

3189503 3193716 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

3245598 3249184 What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

3277461 3280713 - Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

3291766 3296186 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? I got it.

3297813 3300691 We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

3300774 3303860 - This is business, right?
- ( Gun Cocks ) Faster.

3311076 3313494 I hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

3315079 3318082 - What in the crap--
- ( Tires Screech, Siren Wails )

3324463 3327173 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

3332763 3335723 This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

3341771 3344523 You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

3364167 3366377 Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

3377471 3381724 - ( Engine Rattling )
- Holy shit! Goddamn foreign cars!

3395029 3398741 Oh, I hate this.
This ain't good.

3421845 3425099 But I don't know what--
What? Huh? What?

3425141 3427935 What are you talking about?
No, no, no, no, no.

3427977 3431104 You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, I remember her.

3431146 3433315 We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

3433398 3436651 She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

3436734 3440321 And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

3440405 3443824 into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

3443908 3447161 It's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

3447244 3452165 What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

3463176 3468389 I know you. I know you.
I knew I knew you.

3468431 3472518 I knew I knew you.
But you ain't you.

3472685 3476605 You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

3476688 3480150 This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

3480192 3482570 We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

3487199 3490160 There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!
3500377 3503339 and felt how awful goodness is."

3573321 3575615 ( Woman ) This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

3575698 3578033 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

3578075 3582455 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, "Devil's Night"...

3582538 3585957 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3586041 3591422 Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

3591463 3596634 Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

3596718 3600346 The mayor has fire fighters
from all surrounding counties--

3600429 3604225 Do you like them up or over?
I can't remember.

3606269 3608979 What are you doing?
I don't even like eggs.

3609062 3613984 - Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when I was five.

3614068 3618196 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3618279 3621616 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

3621658 3626787 Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

3632668 3637923 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

3640425 3644721 Oh, forget it. I never was
too good at this mommy shit.

3669411 3672330 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

3672413 3675667 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

3675750 3679962 - We're gonna have to l.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

3682048 3684008 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

3696144 3699689 I got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

3703109 3705528 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

3705611 3709489 - You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

3709573 3711700 Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

3711784 3714662 who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

3714703 3717664 Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

3717747 3719666 and you're saying this is
just a fucking automobile accident?

3719749 3722043 - Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

3722127 3724128 I didn't want to interrupt you.
It sounded good.
3724211 3726214 You gotta write that shit down.

3728257 3731344 The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

3731386 3735347 - Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

3739226 3743230 ( Dials Phone )
Yeah, give me the lab.

3793986 3796571 ( Shelly ) One for sorrow,
two for joy...

3796654 3799491 - Come here.
- ...three for a girl, four for a boy.

3897624 3901378 You said,
"Can't rain all the time."
3901461 3904714 That is from your song, right?

3914640 3917768 - ( Cawing )
